price: Nuko abatuye umujyi (inkozi z’ibibi zo mu mujyi w’i Sodoma) baza bishimye (ku bw’inkuru y’abashyitsi ba Loti, bazi ko bagiye kubakorera ubutinganyi, kuko abo bamalayika bari baje mu ishusho y’abagabo)!

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.
